info.title: CIB seven webclient API
info.description: This API exposes the functionality of CIB seven webclient as a REST service under the Apache License 2.0.

put.description:
Request body: Task to be updated with the desired values already modified
Return: void

parameters.name: suspend
parameters.description:
If true, the process instance will be activated
If false, the process will be suspended

parameters.name: includeProcessInstances
parameters.description: Whether to activate or suspend also all process instances of the given process definition

parameters.name: executionDate
parameters.description:
The date on which the given process definition will be activated or suspended
ej. 2013-01-23T14:42:45. yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss
If null, the suspension state of the given process definition is updated immediately

put.summary: Update process definition history time to live

parameters.name: suspend
parameters.description:
If true, the process instance will be activated
If false, the process will be suspended

put.summary: Create a variable in the process instance

put.description: Suspends or activates a job definition by ID
Retries a job by setting the number of retries for the job with the given ID

put.summary: Set annotation for incident by id
Increment job retries by job id
Retry external task by setting retries

get.summary: Get collections of filters
get.description:
Get all filters
Return: Collection filters fetched in the search

put.description:
Request body: A JSON object with the following properties: id, resourceType, name, owner, query and properties
Return: void

post.summary: Create filter
post.description:
Request body: A JSON object with the following properties: id, resourceType, name, owner, query and properties
Return: Filter

put.description:
Request body: A JSON object with the following properties: password and authenticatedUserPassword
Return: 204 No Content

Request body: A JSON object with the following properties: id, name and type
Return: 204 No Content

Request body: A JSON object with the following properties: permissions, userId, groupId, resourceType and resourceId
Return: 204 No Content

post.summary: Get collection of tasks
post.description:
Required by OFDKA Queries for tasks that fulfill a given filter.
This method is slightly more powerful than the Get Tasks method because it allows filtering by multiple process or task variables of types String, Number or Boolean.
Request body: Variables to apply search
Return: Collection tasks fetched in the search

get.summary: Get task with a specific Id
Get identity links, e.g. to get the candidates user or groups of a task

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type of links to include e.g. 'candidate'

post.summary: Create identity links, e.g. to set the candidates user or groups of a task
post.description: <strong>Return: void

post.summary: Delete identity links, e.g. to remove the candidates user or groups of a task
post.description: <strong>Return: void

post.summary: Set assignee to an specific task
post.description:
UserID will be the assignee
Return: void

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: User to be set as assignee

post.summary: Upload file data to a task variable
post.description:
Upload binary data or file to a specific task variable
Request body: Multipart form data with 'data' (binary) and 'valueType' (Bytes/File) parts

post.summary: Post task without saving any variables
post.description:
Saving the variables is done by the ui-element-template (in ours)
Return: void

post.summary: Get number of tasks based on filters
post.description: <strong>Return: Number of tasks

post.summary: Get number of tasks based on filters

post.description: Creates the first admin user. Only works when no users exist in the system. The backend handles group and authorization setup.

parameters.description: Content-Type header to set for file preview in browser (e.g., 'application/pdf', 'image/jpeg', 'text/plain'). When provided, enables inline preview instead of download.

post.summary: Queries for historic process instances that fulfill the given parameters
post.description: Parameters firstResult and maxResults are used for pagination

parameters.name: firstResult
parameters.description: Index of the first result to return

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return

400.description: There is at least one invalid parameter value

post.summary: Count historic process instances that fulfill the given parameters
post.description: Returns the total number of matching historic process instances

400.description: There is at least one invalid parameter value

post.summary: Get job definition/s
post.description: Return: Collection of job definition/s

post.summary: Redeploy an existing deployment
post.description: Re-deploys an existing deployment. The deployment resources to re-deploy can be restricted by using the properties resourceIds or resourceNames. For every contained decision or process definition a new version will be created. Requires CREATE permission on the DEPLOYMENT resource type.

400.description: Bad request - deployment not found or redeployment failed

post.summary: Create a new deployment
post.description: Creates a new deployment.Requires CREATE permission on the DEPLOYMENT resource type.

400.description: Bad request - invalid parameters or deployment failed

post.summary: Set removal time for historic decision instances asynchronously
Delete historic decision instances asynchronously
Authenticates a user and returns (among other things) a token to be passed with other services
Create user
post.description:
Request body: User
Return: 204 No Content

post.summary: Create group
post.description:
Request body: A JSON object with the following properties: id, name and type
Return: 204 No Content

post.summary: Create authorization
post.description:
Request body: A JSON object with the following properties: type, permissions, userId, groupId, resourceType and resourceId
Return: ResponseEntity

get.summary: Retrieves a variable instance by its ID.
get.description: Retrieves a variable instance by its ID with optional value deserialization. Return: Variable instance details

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the variable instance to retrieve

parameters.name: deserializeValue
parameters.description: Whether to deserialize the variable value. If true, the value will be deserialized according to its type.

404.description: Variable instance with the specified ID was not found

400.description: There is at least one invalid parameter value

parameters.name: firstNameLike
parameters.description: First name that the parameter is a substring of

parameters.name: lastNameLike
parameters.description: Last name that the parameter is a substring of

parameters.name: emailLike
parameters.description: Email that the parameter is a substring of

parameters.name: memberOfGroup
parameters.description: Users which are members of the given group

parameters.name: memberOfTenant
parameters.description: Users which are members of the given tenant

parameters.name: firstResult
parameters.description: Specifies the index of the first result to return

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description:
Specifies the maximum number of results to return
Will return less results if there are no more results left

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Specifies the field to sort by

parameters.name: sortOrder
parameters.description: Specifies the order of the sorting

get.summary: Get a group based on filters

parameters.name: nameLike
parameters.description: Name that the parameter is a substring of

parameters.name: member
parameters.description: Groups which the given user id is a member of

parameters.name: memberOfTenant
parameters.description: Groups which are members of the given tenant

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description:
Sort the results lexicographically by a given criterion
Valid values are id, name and type
Must be used in conjunction with the sortOrder parameter

parameters.name: sortOrder
parameters.description:
Sort the results in a given order
Values may be asc for ascending order or desc for descending order
Must be used in conjunction with the sortBy parameter

parameters.name: firstResult
parameters.description: Specifies the index of the first result to return

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description:
Specifies the maximum number of results to return
Will return less results if there are no more results left

get.summary: Get authorization based on filters

parameters.name: type
parameters.description:
Authorization type (0=global, 1=grant, 2=revoke)
See the User Guide for more information about authorization types

parameters.name: resourceType
parameters.description:
integer representation of the resource type
See the User Guide for a list of integer representations of resource types

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description:
Sort the results lexicographically by a given criterion
Valid values are id, name and type
Must be used in conjunction with the sortOrder parameter

parameters.name: sortOrder
parameters.description:
Sort the results in a given order
Values may be asc for ascending order or desc for descending order
Must be used in conjunction with the sortBy parameter

parameters.name: firstResult
parameters.description: Index of the first result to return

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description:
Maximum number of results to return
Will return less results if there are no more results left
